Visit Brown
The best way to get to know Brown is to experience it — here's what you need to know to visit us in Providence, Rhode Island.






























Campus Tours


  Undergraduate Admission offers tours most weekdays and select Saturdays. All tours begin at the Stephen Robert ’62 Campus Center at 75 Waterman St. in Providence.




Register for a campus tour























  Getting Here
















  Coming by Car



  Brown is located near Interstate 95 and 195.




Driving directions and parking information






























  Traveling by Air



  Greater Providence's T.F. Green Airport is 10 miles south of Brown, and Boston Logan International Airport is about an hour's drive from campus.




T.F. Green Airport














Boston Logan International Airport






























  Arriving by Train



  The Providence train station is served by Amtrak and the Massachusetts Bay Transit Authority (MBTA), which provides service between Boston and Providence. The station is a short walk or taxi ride to campus. Multiple ride-hailing services also operate in the city.




Amtrak














Massachusetts Bay Transit Authority























  Staying Here
















  Hotel Accommodations



  See our list of local accommodations. Be sure to mention Brown for a discounted rate.




list of local accommodations























  Campus Map








Campus Map
  This interactive campus map highlights campus buildings, exterior spaces, departments, rooms and more.



View the Campus Map








  Accessibility






Brown is committed to ensuring a fully equitable experience for individuals with disabilities. This campus accessibility map shows accessible entrances, parking, paths and lift locations.campus accessibility map
Accessible campus tours are also available. To request one, please contact the admission office directly at 401-863-2379.





  Featured Events






Brown routinely hosts a wide variety of free, open-to-the-public events featuring scholars, speakers and performers from around the globe. View our University events calendar to see what's happening on campus during your visit.University Featured events calendar
